```{r setup, include = FALSE}
  comment = "#>"

```

Use ezplot to quickly create charts.


```{r, fig.show='hold'}
library(ezplot)
df = ez_data()
head(df)
```

By default, ezplot functions sum values of y when x is repeated.

```{r, echo=TRUE, results='asis'}
list(line_plot(df, x = "month", y = "units"),
line_plot(df, x = "month", y = "units", group = "char"))
```
